description.value:
Your teachings espouse that the justice of society is of utmost value and is a powerful virtue indeed, and one worth protecting.

Teaching Skill Diplomacy

Teaching Reaction @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.fmWkarho9YG2ikPT]{Justiciar's Command}

Empowered Reaction (12th Feat) If the enemy refuses, it takes persistent holy damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Supreme Reaction (14th Feat) Each enemy in your paladin's aura other than the triggering creature must also either drop prone or take holy damage (each enemy chooses). These creatures take only minimum damage (typically 3 damage at 11th level, 4 at 12th, 5 at 16th, and 6 at 19th), and the effects they take can't be adjusted by anything that changes your Justiciar's Command.

For instance, the Justiciar Repercussions feat couldn't turn the damage into persistent holy damage for creatures other than the triggering creature.
